lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: Everyone should have the chance to follow their dreams!
lender.occupational_info: I play and teach Arabic percussion to people all over the world. I also research drumming in cultures throughout the Middle East, Central Asia and the Balkans.

lender.name: Mayen
lender.loan_because: I want to help people achieve better lives. I think we forget a lot in the west how we started and often take everyday things for granted. It's all about getting the bigger house, the newest car, the latest gadget, the trendiest clothes and such. I'm tired of such materialism. Refrigerators, sewing machines, food processors, motorcycles, washing machines, electricity, running water, etc., unfortunately seem mundane to many people who grew up with such luxuries. Yet those whose businesses critically rely on them, are the ones who really need them the most. I rather spend my money on things that actually matter.
lender.occupational_info: I create artwork and photography for all things print and web.

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because: I love capitalism
lender.occupational_info: I help companies develop their people.

lender.name: Caz
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: Raising four children.

lender.name: Brandy
lender.loan_because: it's time to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English classes.

lender.name: Lynne
lender.loan_because: We can all use some help now and again.

lender.name: Jesse
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can. By an American standard, I'm pretty poor. I'm a student working long hours for very little money. But I realize that I can do a lot of good with very little.

lender.name: Jason & Corrinne
lender.loan_because: We believe in you and we want you to succeed!

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I can help
lender.occupational_info: I make certain that tools work

lender.loan_because:

lender.name: Keith
lender.loan_because: i want to do my part, and I can help make a difference in somebody else's life.
lender.occupational_info: i look after computer networks for the financial industry

lender.name: holly
lender.loan_because: I believe small efforts to empower my sisters in the world can improve living conditions and create opportunities for prosperity and happiness for all human beings.
lender.occupational_info: I am raising a son who is kind, smart, sensitive and kind to all women in his life. My life is too rich in opportunity to turn a blind eye to the countless women who could use a little help to succeed. I love to cook, embroider, sew, raise pets, read, learn, and know my values are shared by many sisters all over the globe.

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: Making a positive diffference in the lives of others

lender.occupational_info: I am someone who does experiments and research for a chemical company.

lender.loan_because: I have received when in need, have to pass it on. I'm also selfish and believe that help returns to me in the form I need ;-)

lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping a little bit.

lender.name: Trudy
lender.loan_because: I know how hard it can be to make ends meet. I also feel by helping others it can change the world and give some a chance.
lender.occupational_info: Working Security in a big hospital can be heart breaking and also rewarding. It can also be very rough. I work all night duty on 10 hour shifts.

lender.name: Mandy
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a 'break'
lender.occupational_info: We help people discover their abilities and talents through psychometric assessments and we provide training to those who wish to become better leaders.

lender.name: Bruno
lender.loan_because: I find it's the most efficient way to raise people out of poverty in a sustainable manner. I also believe supporting children health/protection/education to be a sustainable approach to charity.
lender.occupational_info: I operate scientific satellites

lender.name: Rodney Howard Browne
lender.loan_because:
What God Wants Us to Hear by Rodney Howard Browne
Put simply, stick with the evangelizing plan God has sure to praise and use. Don't try and be so creative and adorable that folks miss the truth. No need for unintelligible and crazy substitutes that entertain but barely convict the lost and edify the saved. Will you notice something here? This exhortation isn't addressed to the hearer, it's for the spokesman.
The person that is to do that's the one exclaiming the message. Be ready to do it in season and out of season. Don't get on up and begin with an apology that you didn't quite have sufficient time to prepare.
That doesn't wash." And do so faithfully when it's convenient and when it's not. Sadly , in a shocking number of churches today, God's people are being told what they have to hear rather than what they have to hear. A watered-down gospel may attract gigantic crowds ( for some considerable time ), but it has no never-ending impact. I can't say I have been capable of finding any place in the Scriptures where God expresses the least bit of doubt for drawing numbers.
Enjoyable the curious itching ears of our postmodern audiences is an exercise in futility.
Frankly , I'm going to resume doing exactly that, by God's grace, until the day He calls me home. And I think there is a fast-increasing number of supporters who long for nutritive messages based on the Word of the Lord Almighty not human standpoint. The world urgently needs more Christians with the fervor and faith of Paul. Will you be one of them? Will you reply the charge? If this is the case there's no better time than now to start.
Read more about Rodney Howard Browne on these sites:
http://brightkite.com/people/rhbrownebiz http://community.adlandpro.com/members/rhbrownebiz.aspx http://en.netlog.com/rhbrownebiz

lender.name: Garner
lender.loan_because: I want to make a connection with some talented and motivated people that I would otherwise never find.

lender.name: Frank and Liangni
lender.loan_because: We see how hard a lot of people in the world work and enjoying helping a bit here and there.
lender.occupational_info: We are a retired couple who like to travel and see new areas of the world.

lender.name: Travis Bewick
lender.loan_because: We care.
lender.occupational_info: Uk's Oldest awarding body

lender.name: frank
lender.loan_because: I was born and raised in Africa, and want to give something back
lender.occupational_info: I work with financial applications

lender.name: Carolyn
lender.loan_because: After living in Africa for an extended amount of time, I firmly believe that small loans are the best way to help people improve their quality of life in their own countries, which not only benefits those directly receiving the loans, but the local community and economy too.
lender.occupational_info: Helping people eat healthy, by addressing social, economic, and cultural issues associated with their foods.

lender.name: Sami
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me with good luck and fortunes, and now its time to help others on their path.
lender.occupational_info: i run some websites about topic that interest me.

lender.name: Stefan
lender.loan_because: I have the possibilty

lender.name: Oudom
lender.loan_because: I want to help. I hope that what little I have to loan will help someone improve their living condition.
lender.occupational_info: I manage various computer systems for a local University in San Diego, California, USA.

lender.name: Rodney Howard
lender.loan_because:
The Sacrifice by Rodney Howard Browne
His words and his demeanor are so understated, so matter-of-fact, that it is straightforward to miss the drama of this scene.
If I were about to sacrifice my only boy, who embodied all the guarantees that God had ever made to me, I might be overcome with emotion. "I don't understand why God is making me do this, but I am going to do as he is exclaiming. So I'm going up that mountain to sacrifice my boy on that altar, then I'm going home to cry this terrible loss for what's left of my life. According to the book of Hebrews, Abraham knew 3 critical facts.
First, Isaac was to be the vehicle of Almighty God's guarantees ; Isaac must live. Third, God's power is total, even over the power of death. Obviously , Abraham didn't tell Isaac everything he knew about what was to happen on the mountain.
we will not be sure why he withheld that information. Maybe to spare his boy unnecessary fear or fear. But my opinion is that when God does a transforming work in you that involves a trial, he is not testing folks ; he's testing you. Infrequently , strength is mustered in keeping it to ourselves. They've got a knife, wood, and fire for the sacrifice. "Where is the sacrifice?" I love Abraham's answer. "God will provide." The Hebrew uses an idiom that sounds just like something a pop would say today.
Read more about Rodney Howard Browne on these sites:
http://www.intensedebate.com/people/gatjacksonville http://gatjacksonville.jaiku.com/ https://www.kiva.org/lender/gatjacksonville http://www.last.fm/user/gatjacksonville http://www.librarything.com/profile/gatjacksonville

lender.occupational_info: Sometimes good and sometimes bad

lender.loan_because: We have been blessed and successful in this life, and feel we should help others achieve their own success. We realize that good people with good ideas don't always have access to the resources they deserve. We subscribe to the philosophy: there are no great things, only small things with great love.
lender.occupational_info: We are a family from California, United States of America. We are comprised of entrepreneurs, doctors, artists, opticians, students volunteers, grandmas and lawyers.

lender.name: Juliet
lender.loan_because: Well, I was born to a well-off family in the most well-off nation on Earth, so I feel a certain responsibility to share that luck with others. lender.occupational_info: I work for a Healthcare Cost containment company and I design iphone apps and websites for them.

lender.name: Dragonladies.org
lender.loan_because: I am happy to help people who are willing to work, and help themselves. I'm disheartened by the seemingly overwhelming numbers of internet scammers from certain Asian countries. I loan to help as a reminder that dishonest people are only a small fraction of the population of these countries, and the honest people who are willing to work will make good use of a modest amount of help. Please don't assume any connection to the people we lend money to via Kiva, to the scammers reported on our site. The loans we make, and success rate in repayment demonstrate it's possible to make a living, honestly, even in difficult times and locations. Thank you, and good luck to all Kiva participants!
lender.occupational_info: I maintain a website which focuses on internet romance scams, from Asia. We seek to educate and inform the public, help victims, and expose scams and scammers. Please never send money to somebody you only know from the internet.....except to LEND money through Kiva!

lender.name: LoveAnn
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Mandi
lender.loan_because: cause it's good to see how we give money to people in other countries and they do something great with it that benefits their life, like they arn't just taking the money and going to spend it on like a massage chair or something - ya know what I'm sayin?
lender.occupational_info: its a long day full of work, work, work.

lender.name: Amy
lender.occupation: special ed teacher - at risk high school

lender.name: Emilia
lender.loan_because: we each have a part to play in eliminating poverty.

lender.loan_because: I think it is a cool idea.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student studying engineering.

lender.loan_because: I believe in what you are doing and want you to be secure, independent, and free.
lender.occupational_info: I look at how my company does their work and I figure out ways to do it better, faster, or with less cost.

lender.loan_because: I honestly don't know the true answer. Let's start with the fact that I have a few extra bucks at present and would like to help someone out.

lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference.

lender.loan_because: the Lord has loaned to us!
lender.occupational_info: We are business owners of a company called EnviroBottles. We specialize in fundraising with environmentally friendly products for schools, churches, sports teams, etc. We want to fundraise with KIVA now!

lender.name: Doug
lender.loan_because: I have been gifted with so much and want to give back to those less fortunate than me.

lender.name: SuperMan
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.occupational_info: I study physics and math.

lender.name: Marion
lender.loan_because: Its a privilege to help actual families that I see are working hard to bring up their standard of living and allow me to give in this way. Kiva Micro-Finance is a fantastic way to give back. After my loans are repaid, I take the new balance of funds and choose someone new to help make their business dream come true.
lender.occupational_info: I provide new ideas and solutions for businesses in entertainment, food and beverages, parks and resorts.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: someone should use my money before I do.
lender.occupational_info: I design websites and do computer programming of all sorts.

lender.name: Tony
lender.loan_because: I believe in small business.
lender.occupational_info: I help business get the word out about their company to customers.

lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because: Extraordinary people in inauspicious circumstances deserve help.
lender.occupational_info: I design books for American teenagers. They're not all good, but they encourage an otherwise intellectually bereft culture to seek more from the world.

lender.name: Annabel
lender.loan_because: What is a relatively small amount to me can can change someone's life. We all have an obligation to look after each other and share what we have.

lender.name: Arnon
lender.loan_because: I hope to make a small difference

lender.name: Shon
lender.loan_because: it helps!
lender.occupational_info: I work with a MFI that provides credit and education to Guatemalan women who are living in poverty.

lender.name: Henrik
lender.loan_because: I loan because I trust Kiva and I can reloan the money. Instead of giving it away i have full control and i can feel confident that my funds will reach the lender.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a fotomodel and I'm studying communication.

lender.name: Kristen
lender.loan_because: I believe that everyone should be given a chance to improve themselves. This website helps people do just that.

lender.name: Peder Smed
lender.loan_because: We all want a better world Dont we? Also active on Zidisha.org and myc4.com Check m out !
lender.occupational_info: I teach danish to foreigners

lender.name: Jordan
lender.loan_because: God blessed me to. I heard about Kiva through the Global Leadership Summit 2009 which was really cool as I got an idea as to what it was all about. Seeing these people taking such an initiative was something that I really wanted to support and the idea of microfinancing to get people started in business is an awesome idea.
lender.occupational_info: I'm studying mechanical engineering which is basically making sure that any type of machine will work like it was meant to. Doing this involves reading lots of books and learning lots of equations. Aside from that I play bass guitar in a band at my church, work as a children's party entertainer and prefer smiling over frowning any day.

lender.name: Eliza
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power and effect of each person's actions in shaping the kind of world we live in.
lender.occupational_info: I work teaching English to children aged 3-6 in Austria.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: it is the right thing to do. When everyone does well economically, across the world, it fosters peace and stability. My world travels have shown me that everyone wants the same thing; a safe and secure life for their family.

lender.name: Hanna
lender.loan_because: I care about other people.

lender.name: Cameron
lender.loan_because: Our current world situation has made me realize the importance of judicious use of the credit system, and its importance to small business individuals everywhere. This program seems like a good way to help influence that credit system in a positive direction.
lender.occupational_info: i am completing my master's degree in aerospace engineering with a research concentration on computational fluid dynamics. After this I plan on pursuing my master's of divinity and ordination in the United Methodist Church.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: I'm trying to help others achieve a better life and realize their dreams!
lender.occupational_info: Well, computers hold information. I make sure that information is safe.

lender.name: Shana's English Classes
lender.loan_because: it's a great way for students to use English AND help people at the same time.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: so many of us have an abundance of wealth (not just monetarily) that we take most things for granted... I have always been a firm believer that when we give back to those in need, we will be taken care of by a higher power:)
lender.occupational_info: I have been in the Entertainment industry for 30 years... I have lived a very fruitful life, met incredible people all around the world, traveled alot...

lender.name: Alex M
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: Physics student studying for a masters degree.

lender.name: Gina
lender.loan_because: Trabajaba antes con Manuela Ramos en los barrios del Lima; fue una experiencia muy buena, y yo tengo gran respeto por las mujeres empresarias!

lender.name: Patrick
lender.occupational_info: I help big companies build websites and other computer systems

lender.name: Autumn
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping people to continue/create good lives for themselves.

lender.name: Joanna
lender.loan_because: I want to give back to some of the beautiful places I've had the fortune of traveling to.

lender.name: Kristin
lender.loan_because: What better way to help people help themselves.

lender.name: Louis
lender.loan_because: Someone helped me when I needed it, now I help someone.
lender.occupational_info: I make music for CD's, commercials, TV or radio.

lender.name: A Scot
lender.loan_because:
Giving of myself is part of being a good and selfless member of humanity. I don't think it matters who you are, what beliefs you espouse, or where you live ... in today's ever-shrinking world, we can all improve societal injustices and difficulties by simply fighting selfishness, starting with oneself.
Additionally, I feel an especial attachment and duty to the people of Mexico whom I served and loved for 2 years as a missionary representative of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints in Chihuahua, Mexico. Siempre deseo lo mejor para mi querida gente de Mexico.
lender.occupational_info: I coordinate the construction process with clients, subcontractors, architects, and engineers for office, retail, and other commercial interior renovations and improvements.

lender.name: Evelyn
lender.loan_because: I want to give back

lender.name: Sotain
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping others to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: If my itty bitty money can make a big impact on someone's life, then it's worth every penny.

lender.name: Katharine
lender.loan_because: Everyone can give a little.
lender.occupational_info: I'm writing a dissertation on literature and social justice movements.

lender.name: Leanne
lender.loan_because: it makes me feel good knowing that I helped a good idea get off the ground...an idea that might have gone unnoticed.
lender.occupational_info: I am a secondary teacher in a French High school in chilly Winnipeg Manitoba. My grade 11 Math students are helping out with this project and are as excited as I am to see how small loans can change lives. Je suis enseignante de math dans une cole franaise ici Winnipeg au Manitoba. Mes tudiants ont voulu aussi particip donc voil le projet. On s'attend avec grande impatience le fruit de nos efforts partout dans le monde.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: Better than tithing and the money goes to those who are helping themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I make databases for lawyers

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: I believe women need a chance and the tools to succeed in life, and by giving an opportunity to a woman, you give an opportunity to her children, grandchildren and the rest of the community.
lender.occupational_info: My company helps pharmaceutical companies develop new drugs.

lender.name: Rich
lender.loan_because: maybe just a small effort by many, can help change the life of someone with a dream.
lender.occupational_info: Inspect new commercial and residential buildings and developments to insure compliance with structural engineering documents, life ,health and safety minimum building,plumbing,mechanical and electrical code standards.

lender.loan_because: I think this is the best way to help people by giving them the chance to improve their business and grow.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a computer engineer specialized in network security

lender.occupational_info: I help organizations share their stories to help build a community around their cause.

lender.occupational_info: I provide specialized skills and experience to help companies use software in a manner that makes them more efficient.

lender.name: Chadd
lender.loan_because: Trying to make the world a better place. Microfinance can affect many lives.
lender.occupational_info: Construction of affordable and sustainable buildings.

lender.name: Cherry Hills Christian
lender.loan_because: We loan because we feel God's calling to bless others around the world. We held a "Break Dress Code" day and students brought in a minimum of $2.00 each to be out of dress code for a day. We raised over $1675 and have sent the funds onto Kiva. We are excited to watch the money we raised work to help bless others.

lender.occupational_info: I am in school to get my master's of arts in teaching degree. I am also a fine arts photographer.

lender.name: Larry
